showScoreExcerpt:
"In an artful blend of musical theater glamour and Latin grooves, the world-premiere musical 'On Your Feet! The Story of Emilio & Gloria Estefan' brings that duo to the stage in a colorful and immensely entertaining production...The first act packs in number after high-energy number, keeping up a brisk and exciting pace...The pace slows a bit too much, however, in the second act when things take a more serious turn...The more grave, slower-paced side of the show lasts a few moments too long."
